store_speed_component.feat_des2: Reduce the Java script of the third-party apps without causing any interruption.
store_speed_component.feat_des3: Remove uninstalled apps' leftover code that is slowing down the theme's speed.
store_speed_component.feat_des4: Based on Google Analytics, assign a priority level and tell the browser to preload the content.

perfomance_component.title: Only $150, maximize your website's perfomance with OneExperts

customer_say_component.title: WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY?
customer_say_component.review_des1: The app literally saved my store. Before I used the  OneExperts I had 25 in Score on Google site Speed and 40 on computer. After I payed which was very cheap, I got 96 on computer and 78 on mobile. You lose about 65% of your customers if you have a similar score to what I had. Thank you
customer_say_component.review_des2: I can't put into words how amazing this app was and for an additional $150 they cleaned up code and got us from a Google lighthouse score of 35 to 95. We have spent a year trying to accomplish this and they did it in 2 days. They have my highest recommendations.
customer_say_component.review_des3: Absolutely brilliant app & the support couldn't be more helpful. I have used the  OneExperts Service to boost my store speed. The price was very reasonable & the results are excellent. My store mobile speed has increased by around 30 points. So happy. I can't recommend highly enough.

questions_component.title: Got a question? Get help anytime, 24/7
questions_component.des: Have tested on thousands of stores to find out what works best. We believe good ideas worth spreading.

list_question.title: Do I need to provide store permission for the process to start?
list_question.des: Yes, we need Apps, Themes, Product, and Reports permissions to evaluate and optimize your store speed. Therefore, you will need to provide us with a Staff account with those permission in order to do our job. Also, we do have a Privacy policy here, so please do not worry about leaking your valuable information.

list_question.title: What can I expect from OneExperts service?
list_question.des:
A higher mobile speed score on Google PageSpeed Insights Senior Developers with 5+ years of experience in the Shopify market will take care of your website speed. Depending on the current situation and your store structure, we might optimize your store using these techniques:
- Lazy load images and videos
- Render images in a proper size
- Minify JS/CSS code
- Implement preloading tactics
- Optimize CSS and Liquid code
- App analysis
We'll monthly check up on your speed performance after optimizing and you will be consulted for free by our Customer Support Specialist.

list_question.title: Will optimization affect the design of my store?
list_question.des: No, our optimization process will only boost your store speed and won't affect anything else (layout, components, features...). To make sure things are safe, we only optimize on the duplicated theme and you can review it before publishing it in your store.

list_question.title: What if I notice there is no improvement after optimization?
list_question.des: Yes, we need Apps, Themes, Product, and Reports permissions to evaluate and optimize your store speed. Therefore, you will need to provide us with a Staff account with those permission in order to do our job. Also, we do have a Privacy policy here, so please do not worry about leaking your valuable information.

list_question.title: Can I make changes to the site while your team is working on it?
list_question.des:
We try our best to make future-proof as much as possible by editing the Liquid theme code and using JavaScript anywhere when applicable. Therefore the edits we perform on your theme are generally long-lasting. We also provide recommendations in the report at the end of the project to give you information for the future. Keep in mind that any changes you make after we have done the optimization task can easily affect our final testing result. We should not have any responsibility in case your store speed becomes worse. Those changes include but are not limited to:
- Change your theme template/structure
- Change the design of your website (font, images, videos, contents, etc.)
- Add more products to your store
- Add more third-party apps
- Delete our optimize code without our notice
In that case, we can do a Free technical analysis for you, and if needed, you would need to open a new request for us to optimize your store again.

pricing_page.title: Do you want more Advanced techniques?
pricing_page.des: Improve the Speed of your Store and increase Sales Conversion

dataTableCollapse.thirdRow: 7-Years Experience Developers from Store Speed Optimization Experts

dataTableCollapse.titleRow: Increase speed score in Google PageSpeed Insights
dataTableCollapse.toolLabelHeader: Score will be calculated in 3 main pages including Homepage. Collection pages and Product pages
dataTableCollapse.toolLabelRow: Your speed score will be increased for sure, OR we will refund the whole fee without ask

dataTableCollapse.titleRow: Free Site Audit & Consultant before optimizing

dataTableExpand.titleRow: Image optimization with Smart Lossy Compression
dataTableExpand.expandInfo: Swift uses the latest Smart Lossy image compression techniques to reduce up to 70% in image sizes for maximum page speed.

At the beginning of each month, you will receive 1000 free images to optimize if you have bought our monthly subscription plan. Since compressing images can be done easily by automatic tool but does not bring much effect to speed score, we do not include it in the Expert service.
Make your theme files smaller to boost your store's speed.

Swift actively monitor your store to detect new product images and newly changes in theme, then compress them automatically so that they don't decreate your page speed or your Core Web Vitals metrics. So that you don't have to run the optimize tool after changing your site.

Basic: Lazyload unseen images from initial loading using AI tool
Advance: Lazy load unseen images from initial loading by human coding to ensure the problem with offscreen images will be resolved on Google PageSpeed Insights
Our experts will utilize responsive image sizes to load the right image size each time, thus stopping large images to hurt your page speed.
Load YouTube/Vimeo video player on-demand when the user clicks on the Play button & thumbnail image only instead of auto-play.

dataTableExpand.titleRow: Minify JS, CSS and HTML files
dataTableExpand.expandInfo: Minification takes the beautified, well formed code (CSS/JS/HTML files), and removes the spacing, indentation, newlines, and comments in order to reduce the size of the source code, making its transmission over the Internet) more efficient.

A technique that extracts the CSS for above-the-fold content in order to render content to the user as fast as possible. Above-the-fold is all the content a viewer sees on page load, before scrolling.

Web Fonts (most used is Google Fonts) pulled from the web aren’t as fast as system fonts (those installed on your computer). Web traffic outside of your website becomes part of the loading speed. Therefore, preloading your web fonts is worth doing to improve your site’s loading speed.

dataTableExpand.titleRow: Optimize JavaScript code from third-party apps
dataTableExpand.expandInfo: Too many scripts from other apps can hurt your page speed. We analyze the apps loaded on your store, defer and monitor them to reduce their impact on your store.

dataTableExpand.titleRow: Fix issues manually warned by Google PageSpeed Insights tool
dataTableExpand.expandInfo: We will investigate and check all warnings in Google PageSpeed Insights and fix them (if possible) in order to increase your speed score.

dataTableExpand.titleRow: Free store speed analysis and suggestions
dataTableExpand.expandInfo: Receive a free analysis about your store's current speed situation, and suggestions to improve it.
In case you have installed slow app(s) and/or theme, we will give you some suggestions, and you will be the person to decide finally.
We always try our best to provide a world-class support service when we are online. Any questions/concerns should be replied within 1 business day.
A dedicated account manager will follow up from the first day after buying service, and will be your main contact point for the whole life.
You will have a chance to preview optimized theme, and test functions before publishing it to your live store.
Monthly our system will evaluate your store, and we will send you an email notification in case your speed score is being decreased.
